ai_data_engineering.title: Inside OpenAI’s in-house data agent
ai_data_engineering.summary:
Data powers how systems learn, products evolve, and how companies make choices. But getting answers quickly, correctly, and with the right context is often harder than it should be. To make this easier as OpenAI scales, we built

data_modeling_governance.title: The Semantic Layer Is Back. Here's What We're Doing About It.
data_modeling_governance.summary:
There's a new wave of enthusiasm around semantic layers, and for once, I think the hype is justified.
Since the very early days of analytics, self-service has been the holy grail, yet it's still largely unsolved. We built increasingly powerful tools. We democratized SQL. We made dashboards beautiful

news.title: Avec Gemini Nano, voyez l'IA vie en rose !
news.summary: Avec Gemini Nano, venez découvrir l'IA générative gratuite, qui protège vos données et à disposition (un jour) de tous vos utilisateurs !

warehouses_engines.title: Snowflake and OpenAI partner to bring frontier intelligence to enterprise data
warehouses_engines.summary: OpenAI and Snowflake partner in a $200M agreement to bring frontier intelligence into enterprise data, enabling AI agents and insights directly in Snowflake.
